Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Australian people are eager to know the content of the country's budget as there are  various posts on social media emphasizing the financial relief Australians need. The budget includes a focus on repairing the damage left by the previous government as well as providing immediate help for those in need while setting up the foundation for a stronger economy for the future. The Australian government has introduced programs for women and families especially addressing the gender pay gap.
